tool_description: Tracks product expiration dates, generates alerts for items nearing expiration, and calculates waste reduction opportunities.

alert_days_ahead.description: Days before expiration to trigger alerts (1-14)

error_messages: Invalid alert period: alert_days_ahead must be between 1 and 14 days.
Location not found: The specified location_filter does not exist in the inventory system.
Missing expiration data: Some inventory items lack expiration date information.
usage: Set how many days ahead to alert for expiring items and optionally filter by storage location. The tool monitors all perishable inventory and provides actionable expiration insights.

expiring_items.description: Names of items expiring within alert period

days_remaining.description: Days until expiration for each item

waste_risk_value.description: Total dollar value at risk of being wasted

urgent_count.description: Number of items expiring within 24 hours
